We are trying to capture a website that uses kohana php framework. Kohana h=
as a bug where it has an if statement to check if there is a user-agent in =
the header. If that if statement is correct it then attempts to check Accep=
t in the header. Because Heritrix doesn't set one it bombs out and you just=
 get a PHP error screen generated by kohana.

Does any one know if it is po=
ssible to set an Accept in the header?
